docs.snippet: THE French Riviera is preparing for its Summer visitors. Although the old guard continues to patronize Cannes, Juan les Pins, Antibes and Nice, many tourists search for modest inns and small villas in the less prominent resorts.
docs.lead_paragraph: THE French Riviera is preparing for its Summer visitors. Although the old guard continues to patronize Cannes, Juan les Pins, Antibes and Nice, many tourists search for modest inns and small villas in the less prominent resorts.

headline.main: RANDOM NOTES FOR THE SUMMER TRAVELER; The French Riviera Gets Ready for Its Big Season -- Poland Plans a Fair

docs.snippet: The tense political and financial conditions abroad accounted for a sweeping downward revision in foreign currencies last week. On a volume of business which was small and all out of proportion to the size of the decline a number of the major units...
docs.lead_paragraph: The tense political and financial conditions abroad accounted for a sweeping downward revision in foreign currencies last week. On a volume of business which was small and all out of proportion to the size of the decline a number of the major units established new lows for the year while others scraped the previous minimums.

headline.main: FOREIGN EXCHANGE RATES WEEK; ENDED MARCH 28, 1936
